title: Looking to make a team for season 7
body: Hey guys I'm not part of a signed team or anything just a uni student looking to better his skills with friends. However, I'm sick of people not committing (never playing quit after placements) so please only comment/add me if you are in for a long haul. I'll adc or mid and then I need the rest :) Im gold 5 btw

replies.body: I was away for the weekend and I will be now contactable and will be speaking to all of you when you get online :)
this is the league boards, his ign is his name here
Yeah I play adc/mid and I'm keen

I am a support main and currently at Silver V.
I have a team but thinking of leaving because of personal reasons.
Right now, i can only play support but thinking of also trying out other lanes
